T02D1764:255a-1: shr'i n'a tha k'a la s'a dhan'am /
T02D1764:255b-0: dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub @255b thabs /
T02D1764:255b-1: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1764:255b-2: tho rangs mal nas langs nas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa sngon du song bas /
T02D1764:255b-3: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su sngags pa stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1764:255b-4: rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i nyi ma'i
T02D1764:255b-5: dkyil 'khor la h'um yig de nyid sngon po rnam
T02D1764:255b-6: par bkod nas / de'i 'od zer gyis bdag nyid kun du snang bar byas te /
T02D1764:255b-7: mdun gyi bar snang la bla ma dang sangs rgyas
T02D1764:255b-8: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis bltas nas
T02D1764:255b-9: / yid kyi rang bzhin gyis mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02D1764:255b-10: bdud rtsi lnga yang dbul bar bya'o//
T02D1764:255b-11: de nas phyag 'tshal nas don mngon du byed pa sngon du 'gro bas 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1764:255b-12: sdig pa thams cad 'jigs pas 'chags par bgyid //
T02D1764:255b-13: 'gro ba'i dge la dga' bas yi rang ngo //
T02D1764:255b-14: dkon mchog gsum po la yang skyabs su mchi //
T02D1764:255b-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
T02D1764:255b-16: de nas sems can bde ba la nye bar sdud pa'i rnam pa can gyi byams pa dang /
T02D1764:255b-17: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu mtha' dag las
T02D1764:255b-18: bral bar 'dod pa'i rnam pa can gyi snying rje
T02D1764:255b-19: dang / zag pa med pa'i bde ba rgyun mi
T02D1764:255b-20: 'chad par mos pa'i rnam pa can gyi dga' ba
T02D1764:255b-21: dang / dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos brgyad spong
T02D1764:255b-22: ba'i rnam pa can gyi btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o
T02D1764:255b-23: dang / dang / // de'i rjes la mchod bya dang /
T02D1764:255b-24: mchod pa rnams dbyer med par dmigs nas /
T02D1764:255b-25: aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham zhes
T02D1764:255b-26: bya ba'i sngags brjod pa sngon du song bas dper
T02D1764:255b-27: na rmi lam gyi shes pa ltar rang gi sems
T02D1764:255b-28: nyid de dang de'i rnam pas gzung ba med pa'i
T02D1764:255b-29: phyir de la 'dzin pa'i yid kyang med ces thog
T02D1764:255b-30: mtha' med pa nas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
T02D1764:255b-31: par yid kyis dmigs pas stong pa nyid mngon du
T02D1764:255b-32: bya'o // de'i rjes la sngon smon lam rjes su
T02D1764:255b-33: dran pas skad cig gis bar snang du yi ge
T02D1764:255b-34: bam las byung ba'i padma'i steng du /
T02D1764:255b-35: aa las grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um
T02D1764:255b-36: gi de nyid kha dog nag po las byung ba
T02D1764:255b-37: / rje btsun dpal nag po chen po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1764:256a-0: sku mdog nag po spyan 'bar ba chen po g-yas g-yon gyi phyag @256a * //
T02D1764:256a-1: na gri gug dang ka p'a la 'dzin pa /
T02D1764:256a-2: mgo bo'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa /
T02D1764:256a-3: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1764:256a-4: 'jigs pa'i mche bas 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1764:256a-5: sku la thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1764:256a-6: yan lag thung ba zhal nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag par skad cig gis bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1764:256a-7: rang gi snying ga'i h'um de nyid kyi 'od zer
T02D1764:256a-8: rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu
T02D1764:256a-9: byas la sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1764:256a-10: de la 'di ni sngags yin te /
T02D1764:256a-11: aom ma h'a k'a la h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1764:256a-12: dug dang khrag dang sgog skya dang nyungs kar rnams kyis bdug spos nag po la phul nas /
T02D1764:256a-13: sran ma la sogs pa'i chan dang /
T02D1764:256a-17: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis gtor ma sngags 'dis nag po chen po la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1764:256a-19: aom ma h'a k'a l'a ya /
T02D1764:256a-21: aa pashtsi ma k'a lo ya mi tta ratna tra ya /
T02D1764:256a-23: ya di pra ti dzny'a sma ra si ta d'a /
T02D1764:256a-24: ai dam dusht'am kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1764:256a-31: di na me ke na m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1764:256a-32: de la nye bar spyod pa ni /
T02D1764:256a-33: tsha ba gsum gyis bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1764:256a-34: yan lag thams cad tsher mas bkang ste ;
T02D1764:256a-35: / dug dang khrag gis cho ga bzhin du mngon par byugs shing /
T02D1764:256a-36: gang gi ming nas smos te /
T02D1764:256a-37: me la gdung ba ste de'i mod la mi snang zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1764:256a-38: de bzhin du gang zhig rtag tu bla ma la 'khu ba dang /
T02D1764:256a-40: gang zhig sems can du ma nyams par byed pa de /
T02D1764:256a-41: nag po chen pos de'i lus la sha bcad nas za bar 'gyur zhing /
T02D1764:256a-43: de bzhin du mgo bo la zhugs nas til 'bru
T02D1764:256a-44: tsam du byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1764:256a-45: cho ga rgyas par shes par bya'o //
T02D1764:256a-46: yang na dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang khrag dang /
T02D1764:256a-47: dur khrod kyi sol bas mi rus kyi smyu gus
T02D1764:256a-48: gri gug gi chang gzungs la rtsibs brgyad kyi 'khor
T02D1764:256a-49: lo bris la shar nas brtsams te rim pa bzhin
T02D1764:256a-51: aa mu kam m'a ra ya sv'a h'a zhes pa
T02D1764:256a-52: nas rtsibs gzhan la yang lte ba la ni h'um
T02D1764:256b-0: gnyis spel lo // mu khyud @256b kyi re kh'a
T02D1764:256b-1: gnyis kyi bar du ni sngar gyi phreng ba'i sngags
T02D1764:256b-2: gnyis spel lo // so // 'khor lo 'di rab
T02D1764:256b-3: tu gnas pa sngon du song bas skud pa sngon
T02D1764:256b-4: gnyis spel lo // so // pos dkris te /
T02D1764:256b-5: thod pa kha sbyar du bcug ste thal bas bkang
T02D1764:256b-6: gnyis spel lo // so // pos dkris te / ste / yang tha gu sngon pos bcings /
T02D1764:256b-7: dur khrod dus mtho gang tsam du brkos pas sba bar bya'o //
T02D1764:256b-8: de'i steng du rang nyid nag po chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D1764:256b-9: kha lhor bltas te khro ba dang bcas pas sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1764:256b-10: aom ma h'a k'a la h'um h'um phat phat aa mu kam m'a ra ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1764:256b-11: de ltar nyin re bzhin byas na zhag bdun nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1764:256b-12: gal te shi bar ma gyur na /
T02D1764:256b-13: 'khor lo de nyid dum bu dum bur byas te thal ba de dang /
T02D1764:256b-14: mi'i sha dang lhan cig tu chang gis byugs /
T02D1764:256b-15: de mngon spyod kyi thab khung du sbyin sreg byas na /
T02D1764:256b-16: gdon mi za bar 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1764:256b-17: dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs byin rlabs dang bcas pa /
T02D1764:256b-18: slob dpon chen po bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1764:256b-20: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal su m'a ti k'irti dang /
